title: Space Adventure Cobra (Space Adventure Cobra: The Movie)
synopsis: Cobra, a notorious space pirate, is enlisted by bounty hunter Jane to rescue her sister from the strange being known as Crystal Boy, but then finds himself drawn into a complex struggle over the fate of a mysterious wandering planet.
voices: ['Matsuzaki, Shigeru', 'Sakakibara, Yoshiko', 'Nakamura, Akiko', 'Mutsumi, Gorou', 'Fubuki, Jun', 'Tajima, Reiko']
staff: [['Dezaki, Osamu', ['Director', ' Storyboard']], ['Terasawa, Buichi', ['Script', ' Original Creator']], ['Matsuzaki, Shigeru', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Miyazaki, Hayao', ['Key Animation']]]
